event_description:
TITUS EICHENBERGER DENISE KOBLER DORIS VON STOKAR «DRAWING Part 3» Eröffnung Freitag, 10. März 2017, 17– 20 Uhr Finissage Samstag, 8. April 2017, 13–16 Uhr Öffnungszeiten Mo / Di/ Do: 14 –18 Uhr, Sa: 13–16 Uhr (Wichtig: geänderte Öffnungszeiten) oder nach Vereinbarung Die KünstlerInnen sind an der Eröffnung und der Finissage anwesend. Sie und Ihre Freunde sind herzlich eingeladen.

event_title: On rituals and remedies in troubling times
event_description:
Over the course of a week an impressive assemblage of Zürich artists and guests gather and settle in the spaces of Walcheturm gallery to research notions of ritual in contemporary society. Circumventing the kind of thinking that prescribes rituals as exotic practices of other cultures or even vestiges of social conservatism, they embrace rituals as an arena in which social change can emerge and be absorbed in social practice. Artistic direction Simone Aughterlony With Evalyn Eatdith, Dagmar Bock, Christopher Füllemann, Marisa Godoy, Reut Nahum, Valérie Reding, Jassem Hindi, Jónathan Ospina, Jen Rosenblit, Martin Schick, David Suivez Open for public: Thursday, March 16, 22h Saturday, March 18, 22h On two evenings, the first just two days into their lab and the second as a culmination, the artists invite you to meet in a temporary gathering where concerns and complications of ritualization are shared. Details: http://www.tanzhaus-zuerich.ch/projekte/on-rituals-and-remedies-in-troubling-times
